title: Border, early 19th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Alençon with a pattern of dots and leaves known as "semé de larmes" powdered over the ground. Edged by cartouche forms and circles. Fond: bride bouclée, bride tortillée. Modes: enchainettes, point mignon, pattern outlined by cordonnet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-252.
